Telemetry Disabled.description: Triggered when a user decides to disable telemetry. Last event sent before disabling telemetry.

Training Started.description: A user started a training of a Rasa machine learning model. The event provides information on aggregated training data statistics.

language.description: Language model is trained with, e.g. 'en'

training_id.description: Generated unique identifier for this training

model_type.description: Type of model trained, either 'nlu', 'core' or 'rasa'

pipeline.description: Json dump of the pipeline configuration used for training

policies.description: Json dump of the policies configuration used for training

num_actions.description: Number of actions defined in the domain.

num_templates.description: Number of templates defined in the domain.

num_slots.description: Number of slots defined in the domain.

num_forms.description: Number of forms defined in the domain.

num_intents.description: Number of intents defined in the domain.

num_entities.description: Number of entities defined in the domain.

num_synonyms.description: Total number of entity synonyms defined.
